column5: Come on bro use a better choice of words "tearing" "nerve damage" thorough examination  I think was good enough

Everything's going to be alright I wish it 
was like the old days get the gang together find the sick motherfuckers who did this and make them pay for it ten times. But realistically stay in prayer talk to a counselor if you have to 
and cut that girlfriend off anybody would common sense wouldn't say something  so stupid to their lover after such an experience. To me bro I dont know you personally  but 
as I'm reading your story it sounds like you where set up just my opinion watch who you keep around friends to girlfriends the way you where singled out in this situation and targeted to me it sounds like someone had it out for you sorry if you take this offensive  I didn't mean for this comment to be offensive I just keep shit real.
